gurmukhi: jYsy qau imTweI rwKIAY iCpwie jqn kY cItI cil jwie cIin qwih lptwq hY
transliteration: Jaisay Tau Mitthaaee Raakheeai Chhipaai Jatan Kai , Cheetee Chali Jaai Cheeni Taahi Lapataat Hai ?
translation: Just as sweetmeats are hidden carefully and yet ants reach it with impunity and cling to them,

gurmukhi: dIpk jgwie jYsy rwKIAY durwie giiH pRgt pqMg qw mY shij smwiq hY
transliteration: Deepak Jagaai Jaisay Raakheeai Duraai Grihi , Pragat Patang Taa Mai Sahaji Samaati Hai ?
translation: Just as a lit lamp is carefully hidden in the house, yet a moth is able to find it and merges in its flame,

gurmukhi: jYsy qau ibml jl kml iekwNq bsY mDukr mDu Acvn qh jwq hY
transliteration: Jaisay Tau Bimal Jal Kamal Ikaant Basai , Madhoukar Madhu Achavan Tah Jaat Hai ?
translation: Just as the lotus flower of fresh and clean water blooms in solitary place, but the black bee always reaches it to enjoy its elixir,

gurmukhi: qYsy gurmuiK ijh Gt pRgtq pRym skl sMswru iqih duAwr ibllwq hY ]410]
transliteration: Taisay Gurmukhi Jih Ghat Pragatat Prayma , Sakal Sansaaru Tihi Duaar Bilalaat Hai ?410?
translation: So does a devoted disciple of the True Guru whose heart is kindled with the Love of the Lord, the whole world beseeches and whines at his door.  (410)
